name: The Adventures of Little Kristi: Volcanic Get Away
name_original: The Adventures of Little Kristi: Volcanic Get Away
description:
While hiking in a tropical forest, viewing the beautiful flowers, Little Kristi wanders into an active volcano and finds herself TRAPPED! Can you help her make a daring escape?

Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right or WASD

[SPACE] to jump

Esc to quit

Created by Troy Sprague
